---

# deserializeValidationConfig

Deserializes a validation configuration hex string into a `ValidationConfig` object.

## Import

```ts
import { deserializeValidationConfig } from "@account-kit/smart-contracts";
```

## Usage

```ts
const config = deserializeValidationConfig(
  "0xAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAA000004D201"
);
```

## Parameters

### hex

`Hex`
The 26-byte hex string representation of the validation configuration

## Returns

`ValidationConfig`
An object containing the module address, entity ID, global status, and signature validation status
